sentence: While doxxing underage girls is apparently par-for-the-course for Sims, it doesn’t fit into Josh Shapiro’s clean-cut formula for winning election in November.
author: Matthew J. Brouillette
title: Matthew J. Brouillette: Josh Shapiro’s Lt. Governor problem

sentence: Wolf’s term as governor will end this year due to term limits, but his Attorney General, Democrat Josh Shapiro, will happily step into the role of a dictator if elected in November.
author: For Medianews Group
title: Letter to the Editor: Gov. Wolf ignores Pa. constitution again

sentence: Pennsylvania may not stay in the consortium even if Wolf's successor is Democrat Josh Shapiro, the party's presumed nominee who is endorsed by Wolf.
author: MARC LEVY - Associated Press
title: Big greenhouse gas state taking biggest climate step yet
